alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 12 at 2:41PM AKDT until May 13 at 8:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is possible. * WHERE...The Yukon River near Koyukuk. * WHEN...Through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...An ice jam on the Yukon River approximately 9 miles downriver of Koyukuk has caused water levels to rise in Koyukuk. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An ice jam may cause water to infiltrate the lowlands along the river. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
